response.original_title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
response.overview: While the Civil War rages on between the Union and the Confederacy, three men – a quiet loner, a ruthless hitman, and a Mexican bandit – comb the American Southwest in search of a strongbox containing $200,000 in stolen gold.
response.tagline: For three men the Civil War wasn't hell. It was practice.
response.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
